Changelog
=========

1.0 (2013-11-15)
--------------------

- Bigger textarea for comment-text
  [erral]


1.0b3 (2012/10/02)
-------------------

- Require plone.app.discussion.ReviewComments permission to edit the comment
  instead of cmf.ManagePortal
  [erral]

1.0b2 (2012/10/02)
--------------------

- Improve package metadata
  [erral]

1.0b1 (2012/10/01)
-------------------

- Initial release
  [erral]
